About the Company: KGN Industries Ltd, formerly known as Royal Finance Limited has accelerated its success through trading of agro commodities like Castor oil, Castor oil Derivatives, edible oils like soybean oil, palm oil, non edible oils like petroleum products, lubricants, used oil and others in the domestic market. Presently the company is engaged in the business of leasing, hire-purchase, bill discounting and intercorporate deposits. They are located in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
